expression.display: Cardiovascular disease 10Y risk [Likelihood] ACC-AHA Pooled Cohort by Goff 2013

then.value: Start low to moderate intensity lipid lowering therapy. (USPSTF grade B recommendation)
Consider offering/discuss initiation of low to moderate intensity lipid lowering therapy. (USPSTF grade C recommendation)

element.value: Data requirements not met.  LDL, HDL, ASCVD risk, or smoking status are missing or more than 6 years old.
